rules: Loading state must replace icon/text with a spinner (Loader2) and be disabled.
Touch target size must be at least 44x44px (min-h-[44px]).
Must always be wrapped in a <Label>.
Error state must change border color to 'destructive' and show inline error message.
Focus ring must be visiible (ring-2 ring-ring).
patterns: {error}

rules: Padding (p-6) is standard for body content.
Must support closing via ESC key.
Must trap focus within the modal.
Backdrop must be blurred (backdrop-blur-sm) and dim (bg-background/80).
